languages.text:
The Overseer chooses one cell within the Cyber-Eagle’s maximum ability distance equal to {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cells. It may or may not be occupied. The Cyber-Eagle rushes from its current cell to the targeted one and deals its weapon damage to all enemes on its path. While flying, the Cyber-Eagle doesn’t provoke attacks of opportunity.
Available only if the Cyber-Eagle is not {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Ascended{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The Overseer chooses one cell within the Cyber-Eagle’s maximum ability distance equal to {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cells. It may or may not be occupied. The Cyber-Eagle rushes from its current cell to the targeted one and deals its weapon damage to all enemes on its path. While flying, the Cyber-Eagle doesn’t provoke attacks of opportunity.
Available only if the Cyber-Eagle is not {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Ascended{/g}.

languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects a cell within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} in a 12-cell radius around the cyber-eagle and another unoccupied cell within {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cells from the first one. The cyber-eagle moves to the first cell and then dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing its weapon damage to each enemy in its path without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Надзиратель{/g} выбирает клетку в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g} на расстоянии до 12 клеток от киберорла и еще одну свободную клетку на расстоянии до {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} от первой. Киберорел перемещается в первую клетку. Затем он мчится по прямой на вторую, нанося урон от оружия каждому врагу на пути и не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects a cell within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} in a 12-cell radius around the cyber-eagle and another unoccupied cell within {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cells from the first one. The cyber-eagle moves to the first cell and then dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing its weapon damage to each enemy in its path without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

The Overseer selects a cell within their line of sight in a 12-cell radius around the cyber-eagle and another unoccupied cell within {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cells from the first one. The cyber-eagle moves to the first cell and then dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing its weapon damage to each enemy in its path without provoking attacks of opportunity.
Then, the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects a cell within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} in a 12-cell radius around the cyber-eagle and another unoccupied cell within {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cells from the first one. The cyber-eagle moves to the first cell and then dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing its weapon damage to each enemy in its path without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattında{/g} bulunan ve siber kartalın etrafındaki 12 hücrelik yarıçap içinde duran bir hücreyi ve bu hücreden en fazla {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} hücre uzakta bulunan boş başka bir hücreyi seçer. Siber kartal, ilk hücreye doğru ilerler ve ardından ikinci hücreye doğru düz bir çizgide atılarak yoluna çıkan her düşmana kullandığı silahın hasarını verir. Bu esnada {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects a cell within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} in a 12-cell radius around the cyber-eagle and another unoccupied cell within {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cells from the first one. The cyber-eagle moves to the first cell and then dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing its weapon damage to each enemy in its path without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Gözetmen, görüş hattında bulunan ve siber kartalın etrafındaki 12 hücrelik yarıçap içinde duran bir hücreyi ve bu hücreden en fazla {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} hücre uzakta bulunan boş başka bir hücreyi seçer. Siber kartal, ilk hücreye doğru ilerler ve ardından ikinci hücreye doğru düz bir çizgide atılarak yoluna çıkan her düşmana kullandığı silahın hasarını verir. Bu esnada fırsat saldırılarını tetiklemez.
Ardından da siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeye{/g} başlar.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, görüş hattında bulunan ve siber kartalın etrafındaki 12 hücrelik yarıçap içinde duran bir hücreyi ve bu hücreden en fazla {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} hücre uzakta bulunan boş başka bir hücreyi seçer. Siber kartal, ilk hücreye doğru ilerler ve ardından ikinci hücreye doğru düz bir çizgide atılarak yoluna çıkan her düşmana kullandığı silahın hasarını verir. Bu esnada fırsat saldırılarını tetiklemez.
Ardından da siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeye{/g} başlar.

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} sélectionne une case dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} et dans un rayon de 12 cases autour du cyber-aigle, ainsi qu'une autre case inoccupée à un maximum de {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cases de la première. Le cyber-aigle se place sur la première case, puis fonce sur la deuxième en ligne droite, en infligeant les dégâts de son arme à tous les ennemis sur son passage sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects a cell within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} in a 12-cell radius around the cyber-eagle and another unoccupied cell within {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cells from the first one. The cyber-eagle moves to the first cell and then dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing its weapon damage to each enemy in its path without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Le surveillant sélectionne une case dans sa ligne de mire et dans un rayon de 12 cases autour du cyber-aigle, ainsi qu'une autre case inoccupée à un maximum de {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cases de la première. Le cyber-aigle se place sur la première case, puis fonce sur la deuxième en ligne droite, en infligeant les dégâts de son arme à tous les ennemis sur son passage sans provoquer d'attaques d'opportunité.
Il prend ensuite son {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}envol{/g}.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} wählt ein Feld in seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} in einem Radius von 12 Feldern um den Cyber-Adler sowie ein weiteres, unbesetztes Feld im Abstand von {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} Feldern zum ersten. Der Cyber-Adler bewegt sich zum ersten Feld, sprintet in einer geraden Linie zu dem zweiten Feld und verursacht bei jedem Gegner auf seinem Weg seinen Waffenschaden, ohne {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} auszulösen.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects a cell within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} in a 12-cell radius around the cyber-eagle and another unoccupied cell within {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cells from the first one. The cyber-eagle moves to the first cell and then dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing its weapon damage to each enemy in its path without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Der Aufseher wählt ein Feld in seinem Sichtfeld in einem Radius von 12 Feldern um den Cyber-Adler sowie ein weiteres, unbesetztes Feld im Abstand von {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} Feldern zum ersten. Der Cyber-Adler bewegt sich zum ersten Feld, sprintet in einer geraden Linie zu dem zweiten Feld und verursacht bei jedem Gegner auf seinem Weg seinen Waffenschaden, ohne Gelegenheitsangriffe auszulösen.
Anschließend beginnt der Cyber-Adler, {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}aufzusteigen{/g}.

Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} wählt ein Feld in seinem Sichtfeld in einem Radius von 12 Feldern um den Cyber-Adler sowie ein weiteres, unbesetztes Feld im Abstand von {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} Feldern zum ersten. Der Cyber-Adler bewegt sich zum ersten Feld, sprintet in einer geraden Linie zu dem zweiten Feld und verursacht bei jedem Gegner auf seinem Weg seinen Waffenschaden, ohne {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} auszulösen.
Anschließend beginnt der Cyber-Adler, {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}aufzusteigen{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督者{/g}は、サイバーイーグルの半径12セルの{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界{/g}の中にあるセルを1つ選択し、最初のセルから{uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225}セル以内の別の空いているセルを選択する。サイバーイーグルは1つ目のセルに移動し、それから一直線に2つ目のセルに突進し、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を引き起こすことなく進路上のすべての敵に武器ダメージを与える。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects a cell within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} in a 12-cell radius around the cyber-eagle and another unoccupied cell within {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cells from the first one. The cyber-eagle moves to the first cell and then dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing its weapon damage to each enemy in its path without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
監督者は、サイバーイーグルの半径12セルの視界の中にあるセルを1つ選択し、最初のセルから{uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225}セル以内の別の空いているセルを選択する。サイバーイーグルは1つ目のセルに移動し、それから一直線に2つ目のセルに突進し、機会攻撃を引き起こすことなく進路上のすべての敵に武器ダメージを与える。
それから、サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}を開始する。
監督者は、サイバーイーグルの半径12セルの視界の中にあるセルを1つ選択し、最初のセルから{uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225}セル以内の別の空いているセルを選択する。サイバーイーグルは1つ目のセルに移動し、それから一直線に2つ目のセルに突進し、機会攻撃を引き起こすことなく進路上のすべての敵に武器ダメージを与える。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Надзиратель{/g} выбирает клетку в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g} на расстоянии до 12 клеток от киберорла и еще одну свободную клетку на расстоянии до {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} от первой. Киберорел перемещается в первую клетку. Затем он мчится по прямой на вторую, нанося урон от оружия каждому врагу на пути и не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects a cell within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} in a 12-cell radius around the cyber-eagle and another unoccupied cell within {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cells from the first one. The cyber-eagle moves to the first cell and then dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing its weapon damage to each enemy in its path without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Надзиратель выбирает клетку в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g} на расстоянии до 12 клеток от киберорла и еще одну свободную клетку на расстоянии до {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} от первой. Киберорел перемещается в первую клетку. Затем он мчится по прямой на вторую, нанося урон от оружия каждому врагу на пути и не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.

Надзиратель выбирает клетку в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g} на расстоянии до 12 клеток от киберорла и еще одну свободную клетку на расстоянии до {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} от первой. Киберорел перемещается в первую клетку. Затем он мчится по прямой на вторую, нанося урон от оружия каждому врагу на пути и не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}选择{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内一个格子，此格子距离生化猎鹰的距离不能超过12格，之后选择另一个格子。两个格子之间的距离不得超过{uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225}格，且第二个格子不能被单位占据。生化猎鹰会飞往第一个格子，之后沿直线冲向第二个格子，对路径上的所有敌人造成武器伤害。生化猎鹰的移动不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects a cell within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} in a 12-cell radius around the cyber-eagle and another unoccupied cell within {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cells from the first one. The cyber-eagle moves to the first cell and then dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing its weapon damage to each enemy in its path without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
监察官选择视线范围内一个格子，此格子距离生化猎鹰的距离不能超过12格，之后选择另一个格子。两个格子之间的距离不得超过{uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225}格，且第二个格子不能被单位占据。生化猎鹰会飞往第一个格子，之后沿直线冲向第二个格子，对路径上的所有敌人造成武器伤害。生化猎鹰的移动不会触发借机攻击。
随后，生化猎鹰进入{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} selecciona una casilla en su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} en un radio de 12 casillas alrededor de la ciberáguila y otra casilla libre a una distancia máxima de {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} casillas de la primera. La ciberáguila se mueve a la primera casilla y se lanza en línea recta a la segunda, infligiendo su daño de arma a todos los enemigos en su recorrido sin provocar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects a cell within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} in a 12-cell radius around the cyber-eagle and another unoccupied cell within {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cells from the first one. The cyber-eagle moves to the first cell and then dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing its weapon damage to each enemy in its path without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
El supervisor selecciona una casilla en su línea de visión en un radio de 12 casillas alrededor de la ciberáguila y otra casilla libre a una distancia máxima de {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} casillas de la primera. La ciberáguila se mueve a la primera casilla y se lanza en línea recta a la segunda, infligiendo su daño de arma a todos los enemigos en su recorrido sin provocar ataques de oportunidad.
Después, la ciberáguila {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}se eleva{/g}.
